caption.center: John PADILLA, Petitioner, v. STATE of New Mexico, Respondent.

opinion.opinion_text:
Original Proceeding on Certiorari Ordered that petition for writ of certiorari be and the same is hereby denied.
Further ordered that the record in Court of Appeals Cause No. 1249, 86 N.M. 283, 523 P.2d 17 be and the same is hereby returned to the Clerk of the Court of Appeals.
